Posts.Title: Treatment? Wrap or massage? juliehere OLBinNJ

Posts.Content: Dec 9, 2006 08:13PM SammieKB wrote: I am starting chemo the middle of January 2007 as well. I will be having a mastectomy (lobular tumor over 4 cm) before Christmas. I am pretty much overwhelmed at this point, between insurance company and scheduling everything. I am thankful to be cureable, just dreading the cure. God bless all of you who are going through this.
